title: Implement content moderation for polite language across platform

requirements.summary: Update ProfileSetupModal and ProfileEditForm to display validation error messages when bio contains inappropriate language
acceptanceCriteria: Validation errors are displayed clearly to users

Form submission is prevented when validation fails
